directions: Cut pork into 1-in. slices; flatten to 1/4-in. thickness. In a large nonstick skillet over medium heat, cook pork in butter in batches until tender. Transfer to a serving platter and keep warm.
In the same skillet, cook and stir onion until tender. Stir in the artichokes, broth, capers and mustard; heat through. Serve over pork; sprinkle with parsley. Garnish with lemon. Yield: 4 servings.
ingredients: 1 can (14 ounces) water-packed artichoke hearts, rinsed, drained and chopped
title: Pork with Artichokes and Capers Recipe
